name: The Northbarrow Massacre - Demo
description:
Northbarrow Massacre is an Indie Horror game being developed by 2 people, one of which has barely touched unity...

The demo includes the first chapter of the game, there are plans for multiple chapters:

  • Chapter 1 - The Cabin in The Woods
  • Chapter 2  - The Butcher
  • Chapter 3 - ???
  • Chapter 4 - ???
  • Chapter 5 - ???

Developers - Rigged & Expo

Music - CeleryControl
